## **Kmeans Clustering**

---

```{r s1, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE, comment=NA, fig.width=8, fig.height=7}

## The famous iris dataset
data(iris)
flower = iris

summary(flower)

## Kmeans requires you to predetermine the number of clusters
mdl = kmeans(flower[, 1:4], centers = 3)
flower$cluster = mdl$cluster

## plot
par(mfrow = c(2, 2))
plot(x = flower$Sepal.Length, y = flower$Sepal.Width, col = factor(flower$Species))
plot(x = flower$Sepal.Length, y = flower$Sepal.Width, col = factor(flower$cluster))
plot(x = flower$Petal.Length, y = flower$Petal.Width, col = factor(flower$cluster))
plot(x = flower$Petal.Length, y = flower$Petal.Width, col = factor(flower$Species))

```
